name: Real Train Driver Simulator 3D – drive the engine on railway lines and reach the destination in time
name_original: Real Train Driver Simulator 3D – drive the engine on railway lines and reach the destination in time
description:
Drive the super trains & pick and drop the passengers in time. Theme of the game revolves around an expert train driver who has to be on time on every station. Play your role as a train driver and steer the train to different destination in time. Take the short cuts to the station and reach the station before the time limit and unlock more extreme levels. The challenging part is that you need to drive the train through different challenging tracks including jungle, desert, countryside’s, cities and mountain areas.
Get ready!! Extreme adventures journey is waiting for you.
Features
• 4 different trains to select from.
• Select Futuristic bullet engine or classic old steam engine trains.
• 15 levels of train journey.
• 5 Different map locations and stations to travel.
• Realistic graphics for jungle, city, desert, hilly and countryside environments.
• Pick and drop passengers to their destinations.
• Amazing background music to boost your game play.
